settings.title: Enter To Win Our Best Selling Decoy Sunglasses!
settings.text:
The sun is shining brighter, the days are getting longer, and the call of the great outdoors is more inviting than ever before. Welcome to the Dog Days of Summer and to celebrate, we're turning up the heat with our exciting summer giveaway! Skeleton Optics, in collaboration with Zeiss Technology, is giving away a pair of high-quality sunglasses every week. Yes, you heard that right! Every single week, one lucky entrant will have the chance to sport a pair of our premium shades - the perfect accessory for your summer escapades.

But we're not just about giving you the best eyewear. We're about crafting the perfect summer experience. Our sunglasses, infused with cutting-edge Zeiss Technology, not only give you unmatched style, but they also offer 100% UV protection, crystal-clear vision, and resistance to scratches, impacts, and chemicals. So, whether you're planning to hit the beach, explore a hiking trail, or simply enjoy a sunny barbecue in your backyard, we've got you covered. Sign up for our giveaway today and start your summer with a winning streak!

settings.title: Here's How To Sign Up!
settings.text:
Step 1: Registration Information
Fill in your full name, phone number, and email address to sign up for our Dog Days of Summer Giveaway. Don't forget to confirm your email address!

Step 2: Follow Our Socials
Get to know us better by following Skeleton Optics on Instagram and Facebook. It's a great way to keep up-to-date with our latest news and promotions.

Step 3: Share the Love
Share our giveaway on your social media profiles and tag three friends who love the outdoors as much as you do!

This giveaway is open to participants 18 years and older, residing in the United States. No purchase is necessary to enter or win. A purchase will not increase your chances of winning. The giveaway is subject to federal, state, and local laws and regulations and is void where prohibited by law.

The giveaway starts on 07/23/2023 and ends on 08/31/2023. Winners will be selected randomly each week and will be notified via the email provided during entry. If a winner does not respond within 48 hours, a new winner will be chosen.

The prize is non-transferable, non-exchangeable, and cannot be redeemed for cash or other prizes. By entering the giveaway, participants agree to release and hold harmless Skeleton Optics and its affiliates, partners, and employees from and against any claim arising from participation in the giveaway or receipt or use of any prize.

Skeleton Optics reserves the right to cancel, terminate or modify this promotion at any time. Please note that the personal data collected for this giveaway will be used solely for the purpose of Skeleton Optics marketing and will not be shared with any third parties.

This promotion is in no way sponsored, endorsed or administered by, or associated with Facebook, Instagram or any other social media platforms where this giveaway may be promoted.
